text: I’ve had multiple consultations with Dr. Mavis, and each time has been a positive experience. She’s thorough in her assessments, really takes the time to understand my concerns, and always provides practical and effective advice for my weight management journey. I feel heard and supported under her care. Highly recommended!

Thanks Dr. Mavis, she is though& patient stated.
Body management services are truly transformational, offering a comprehensive approach to achieving long-term results. The tailored treatments, combined with expert guidance on nutrition and exercise, deliver visible improvements in body shape and overall confidence. The procedures are safe, non-invasive, and effective, especially in targeting stubborn areas. Beyond physical changes, they foster healthier habits and a positive mindset, making the journey holistic and empowering. With professional staff and personalized care, body management is a worthwhile investment for anyone looking to enhance their lifestyle and achieve sustainable results.
Dr Terence was really patient for me as a first-timer to any aesthetic clinic. He was very amicable and was thorough in his recommendations. I felt comfortable, not rushed!

Came to see Dr Terence Tan as i needed some weight control. Dr Tan was highly recommended by my niece who saw him too. He was able to help me shed some weight within 4 months and i will be coming back to him for maintenance. The ladies at Halley are really friendly and helpful too.

Here for body contouring treatment. Dr Terence is very meticulous in educating and mapping out the treatment plan and timeline so that I could fit into a nice gown.

Thank you, Alysha & Adlyn,, for assisting. Very skilled and professional.
